CustomField: Otter_Approval_Level_Required__c <<<<<<< HEAD Indicates which level of approval is required based on a predetermined scale. The gap between the quote margin guidance and actual quote margin determines the required approval level: - up to 5% - Level 1 - between 5% and 10% - Level 2 (10%) - above 10% - Level 3 false if (Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Guidance_Pct__c - Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Pct__c <= 0, "No approval required", if (Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Guidance_Pct__c - Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Pct__c <= 0.05, "Level 1", if (Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Guidance_Pct__c - Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Pct__c <= 0.10, "Level 2", if (Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Guidance_Pct__c - Otter_Quote_Total_Margin_Pct__c > 0.1, "Level 3", "aa" ) ) ) ) BlankAsZero Indicates which level of approval is required based on a predetermined scale.
